block.p: The Word for Word article last Sunday excerpting a 1956 medical journal article on Communist interrogation methods misstated the name of the journal. It is The Archives of Neurology and Psychiatry, not The Annals of Neurology and Psychology. In addition, the meaning of the acronym SERE, an American military training program, was misstated. SERE stands for Survival, Evasion, Resistance, and Escape -- not Survival, Evasion, Reconnaissance and Escape.

The Word for Word article last Sunday excerpting a 1956 medical journal article on Communist interrogation methods misstated the name of the journal. It is The Archives of Neurology and Psychiatry, not The Annals of Neurology and Psychology. In addition, the meaning of the acronym SERE, an American military training program, was misstated. SERE stands for Survival, Evasion, Resistance, and Escape -- not Survival, Evasion, Reconnaissance and Escape.
